todoStorage.title: Google Favicon Api
todoStorage.content:
https://www.google.com/s2/favicons?domain=${domain}&sz=${size}

example: https://www.google.com/s2/favicons?domain=dev.to&sz=512 (nothing found for 512x512, so returns a 16x16 PNG)

5. SSD: Western Digital 2TB WD Blue SN570 NVMe (Amazon: 92$)
6. Case: Zalman T7 ATX Mid Tower Premium (Amazon: 50$)
7 PSU: Thermaltake Toughpower GF1 750W 80+ Gold SLI (Amazon: 127$)

todoStorage.title: New Vocab
todoStorage.content:
Workaholic: Người cuồng công việc
Sedentary lifestyle: Lối sống ít vận động
Unforeseen: Không lường trước được

todoStorage.title: Major Vocab
todoStorage.content:
1. Trigger: kích hoạt
2. Mutation: đột biến (object mutation)

todoStorage.title: Redux
todoStorage.content:
part 1: https://viblo.asia/p/redux-cho-nguoi-moi-bat-dau-part-1-introduction-ZjleaBBZkqJ
part 2: https://viblo.asia/p/redux-cho-nguoi-moi-bat-dau-part-2-first-project-aRBvXWQZkWE
part 3: Redux cho người mới bắt đầu - Part 3 Middleware


Middleware Redux-sage: https://viblo.asia/p/redux-middleware-redux-saga-gGJ59X7jlX2


Redux Document: https://redux.js.org/

todoStorage.title: Redux edit case
todoStorage.content:
case EDIT_TODO:
                return state.map((todo) => todo.id === action.id ? { ...todo, text: action.text } : todo);
